content: Moving several files to the Form Filling room is not supported. Move one {{ organizationName }} PDF form at a time.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when moving multiple files to a specific room. The message informs users that this action is not supported and suggests moving one PDF form at a time instead. This message appears in the FilesSelector component when the user attempts to move several files.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Birdən çox faylın" could be more accurately translated as "Bir neçə faylın" or "Çox sayda faylın".  While "Birdən çox" is understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bir neçə faylın Forma Doldurma otağına köçürülməsi dəstəklənmir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'à la fois' is slightly awkward in this context. While technically correct, it sounds less natural than alternatives.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Déplacez un formulaire PDF {{ organizationName }} un par un.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon (:) after 'սենյակ' should be a period (.) to match the English punctuation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մի քանի ֆայլ տեղափոխելը Ձևաթղթերի լրացման սենյակ չի աջակցվում: Միանգամից տեղափոխեք մեկ {{ organizationName }} PDF ձև.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "stanza di compilazione dei moduli" is a literal translation of 'Form Filling room' and might sound unnatural in Italian. A more natural phrasing would be 'area di compilazione moduli' or 'sezione compilazione moduli'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'area di compilazione moduli' or 'sezione compilazione moduli' instead of 'stanza di compilazione dei moduli'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Sposta un modulo PDF {{ organizationName }} alla volta' could be improved for flow. The inclusion of 'PDF' feels a little clunky after 'modulo'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Sposta un modulo PDF {{ organizationName}} uno alla volta' or 'Sposta un modulo {{ organizationName}} PDF alla volta'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ລູກ' (luk) is used for 'files'. While technically meaning 'child' or 'piece', its use in this context is unusual and can be confusing. It implies individual files are 'children' of something.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ລູກ' with a more suitable term for 'files,' such as 'ເອກະສານ' (ekanasan) or 'ໄຟລ໌' (fai).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ໃຫ້ເຄື່ອນແບບຟອມ PDF {{ organizationName }} ຫນຶ່ງຢ່າງຄັ້ງລະຫນຶ່ງ' could be phrased more naturally. 'ຫນຶ່ງຢ່າງ' is somewhat redundant after 'ແບບຟອມ.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'ຫນຶ່ງຢ່າງ' to just 'ຫນຶ່ງ' or rephrase entirely to 'ເຄື່ອນແບບຟອມ PDF {{ organizationName }} ຫນຶ່ງຄັ້ງຕໍ່ຄັ້ງ' or 'ເຄື່ອນແບບຟອມ PDF {{ organizationName }} ຫນຶ່ງຄັ້ງເທົ່ານັ້ນ'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Vairāku failu pārvietošana" is accurate for 'Moving several files', but 'vienlaikus' (simultaneously) is unnecessary and slightly awkward in this context. A more natural translation would be simply 'Pārvietojiet'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pārvietojiet vairākus failus...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the sentence structure in the Latvian translation is a bit stilted. A smoother flow would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vairāku failu pārvietošana uz veidlapu aizpildīšanas telpu netiek atbalstīta. Lūdzu, pārvietojiet vienu {{ organizationName }} PDF veidlapu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses "Przenoś" (imperative form) instead of "Przenoszenie" (gerund/noun form) which doesn't match the structure of the English sentence. It's awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Przenoszenie kilku plików do Pokoju do wypełniania formularzy nie jest obsługiwane. Przenieś po jednym formularzu PDF {{ organizationName }} na raz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'formulário PDF' is repeated unnecessarily. It should be translated more concisely.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Não há suporte para a movimentação de vários arquivos para a sala de preenchimento de formulários. Mova um formulário PDF {{ organizationName }} de cada vez.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'formulário PDF' makes the sentence awkward. It's better to just say 'formulário' after the first instance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Não há suporte para a movimentação de vários arquivos para a sala de preenchimento de formulários. Mova um formulário PDF {{ organizationName }} de cada vez.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation uses "Deplasați" (Move) which is in the formal/command form. The English uses a gentler phrasing. Consider using a less direct form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'Deplasați' with 'Vă rugăm să deplasați' (Please move) for a more polite tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'câte un formular PDF' translates literally to 'each PDF form'. A more natural Romanian phrasing would be 'un formular PDF' (a PDF form).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'câte un formular PDF' with 'un formular PDF'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation uses a mixture of upper and lower case. Generally, Sinhala text is written in lowercase unless it's a proper noun or the beginning of a sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පෝරම් පිරවුම් කාමරයට බොහෝ ගොනු යැවීම සහය නොදක්වයි. එක {{ organizationName }} PDF ආකෘතියක් පමණක් එකවරක් යවන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'එකවරක්' (ekawarak) feels a bit redundant after saying 'එක' (eka). It's grammatically correct but stylistically can be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පෝරම් පිරවුම් කාමරයට බොහෝ ගොනු යැවීම සහය නොදක්වයි. එක {{ organizationName }} PDF ආකෘතියක් පමණක් යවන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'Premiestňujte' (imperative form) is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'Premiestňujte jeden... formulár' or 'Presúvajte jeden... formulár'.  The imperative feels less user-friendly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Presúvajte jeden {{ organizationName }} PDF formulár naraz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'formular' might be improved for readability. While grammatically correct, it could be slightly more elegant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Presúvajte jeden {{ organizationName }} PDF formulár alebo dokument naraz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'obrazec PDF' is slightly awkward. It should be more natural to say 'PDF obrazec'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: PDF obrazec

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'фајлова' is a valid word but can be improved to 'датотека' for a more formal and accurate translation of 'files' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Премјештање више датотека у собу за попуњавање образаца није подржано.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'образац' is a valid word, but 'форма' might be more commonly understood and used in this context, particularly relating to PDF documents.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Преместите један {{ organizationName }} PDF форма у исто време.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'fajlova' is a less common and slightly less formal way of saying 'datoteka' or 'datotečni'. While understandable, 'datoteka' would be more appropriate for a formal document.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Premještanje više datoteka u sobu za popunjavanje obrazaca nije podržano. Premestite jedan {{ organizationName }} PDF obrazac u isto vreme.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrase 'u sobu za popunjavanje obrazaca' could be slightly improved for flow and conciseness. Using 'u prostoriju za popunjavanje obrazaca' is a little more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Premještanje više datoteka u prostoriju za popunjavanje obrazaca nije podržano. Premestite jedan {{ organizationName }} PDF obrazac u isto vreme.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Moving several files' is translated as 'di chuyển một số tập tin,' which is technically correct but sounds slightly awkward in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing might be 'di chuyển nhiều tập tin' or 'di chuyển nhiều file'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Di chuyển nhiều tập tin vào phòng Điền Biểu mẫu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Form Filling room' is translated as 'phòng Điền Biểu mẫu'. While understandable, it might be more natural to use a more common term for 'Form Filling' like 'Nhập liệu biểu mẫu' or simply 'Phòng Biểu mẫu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hãy di chuyển từng biểu mẫu PDF {{ organizationName }} mỗi lần vào Phòng Biểu mẫu.
